recipes.name: Gingerbread Men Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F) and line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Mix flour, baking soda, and ginger in a bowl.
Rub in butter until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.
Stir in sugar and add the syrup and egg to form a dough.
Roll out the dough, cut into shapes, and place on the tray.

recipes.name: Eggnog
recipes.description: Simple creamy and fresh holiday milk
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar together until creamy.
In a saucepan, heat milk and heavy cream until warm (do not boil).
Slowly whisk the warm milk into the egg yolks.
Return the mixture to the saucepan and heat until thickened.
Remove from heat, stir in nutmeg, and optionally add rum.

recipes.name: Candy Cane Bark
instructions: Melt the dark chocolate and spread it evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Allow the dark chocolate layer to set.
Melt the white chocolate and spread it on top of the dark chocolate.
Sprinkle the crushed candy canes over the white chocolate.
Let the bark set completely, then break it into pieces.
